content: this cute crochet mesh bag is perfect for a day at the market or use it as a fun everyday tote stitched in lily sugar n cream you can make this pattern using any solid color you like practice single_crochet double_crochet half_double_crochet slip_stitch and much more to achieve an all-over mesh design finished with simple half_double_crochet straps this grab n go bag is ready for anything materials lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m hot pink 01740 3 balls or 350 yds/318 m measurements a p p r o x 17 43 cm wide x 12½ 32 cm tall excluding handles
